guest_info.name: Brandon Doyle
guest_info.title: Tech Guru and REALTOR
guest_info.company: Doyle Real Estate Team, RE/MAX Results

main_topics: Integrating personal passions into real estate
Smart home technology in real estate
Content creation for real estate marketing
The impact of technology on real estate practices

problems_addressed.specific_problem: How to leverage personal passions to grow a real estate business
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Brandon uses his passion for smart home technology to create content that attracts tech-savvy clients.
Brandon creates hyper-local content focused on new construction and schools to attract serious buyers.
Brandon uses multi-channel engagement including newsletters, social media, and client events.

target_avatars.relevance: The episode provides insights on leveraging personal interests to differentiate and grow a real estate business.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Integrating personal passions like smart home technology can attract niche clients and enhance your brand.

target_avatars.relevance: Brandon discusses systems and strategies for effective team operations and client engagement.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Consistent, multi-channel client engagement is key to maintaining long-term relationships and referrals.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: By going for that longer tail, I'm going to get more of a serious buyer.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: It highlights a specific strategy for attracting high-intent buyers.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Want to attract serious buyers? Here's how focusing on long-tail content can help.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: We do multiple client events per year... It's really just an excuse to reach out to people.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Shows a practical and effective way to maintain client relationships.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Struggling to stay in touch with clients? Here's a simple strategy that works.

key_tactics.tactic: Create hyper-local content focused on specific community aspects like schools.
key_tactics.context: Use this strategy to attract high-intent buyers who are serious about moving to a specific area.

key_tactics.tactic: Host client events as a way to maintain relationships and generate referrals.
key_tactics.context: Use events not just for direct engagement but as a reason to reach out to clients.

quotable_insights: Integrating your personal passions into your business can attract a niche audience and enhance your brand.
Consistent, multi-channel client engagement is key to maintaining long-term relationships and referrals.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: Recommended as a technology partner for real estate agents to generate more business.

resources_mentioned.name: Follow Up Boss
resources_mentioned.context: Used by Brandon for CRM to track email and phone interactions.

resources_mentioned.name: Chat GPT
resources_mentioned.context: Used for repurposing content and generating ideas for social media posts.

episode_summary: In this episode, Brandon Doyle discusses how he integrates his passion for smart home technology into his real estate practice to attract tech-savvy clients. He shares strategies for creating hyper-local content to generate leads and emphasizes the importance of consistent client engagement through multi-channel approaches. Brandon also highlights the role of technology in enhancing the client experience and maintaining long-term relationships.
